alert.note: Alert for Hempstead; Nevada (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued May 12 at 10:11AM CDT until May 12 at 12:00PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CDT TODAY FOR NORTHERN HEMPSTEAD AND NORTHERN NEVADA COUNTIES... At 1011 AM CDT, local law enforcement reported heavy rain from thunderstorms producing areas of flash flooding in and around Blevins. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. The expected rainfall rate is 0.75 to 1.5 inches in 1 hour. Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is already occurring. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Law enforcement reported. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Hope, Prescott, Emmet, Blevins, Perrytown, Washington, Bluff City, Oakhaven, Boughton, Laneburg and Morris. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE EXPECTED RAINFALL RATE...0.75-1.5 INCHES IN 1 HOUR
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
